name: Season Your Planet (Salt'n'Pepper)
description:
Play as an apprentice season stealer on a mission to collect the power of the seasons for your home planet! Explore a changing environment while battling seasonal enemies and hostile weather conditions! Meet the inhabitants of this foreign planet, decide if you want to focus on your mission or aid them, and face the consequences!  Will you succeed or succumb to the seasonal dangers?

“Season Your Planet” is a 2D sidescrolling platformer that focuses on exploring and using the environment to progress through a map of interconnected areas, while avoiding or defeating enemies that are specific to the current season. The goal of the game is to reach and defeat each season's guardian, steal their powers, and successfully return to your home planet.

The game uses handdrawn sprites which were created by the development team artist, Emma Stettner.
